short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark mode for D2L, Google Docs & Google Drive to ease those weary eyes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop the high-contrast webpage fatigue right now. Work on assignments, revisions and other late-night endeavors without the hassle of a bright white screen in the background. 

▷ The extension uses only CSS stylesheets optimized for fast loading and readability.

▷ Customizable color schemes are available. The color palette editor can be found by navigating to the Options page in the extension's settings.

For more information, check the GitHub Link: https://github.com/chicknwaffles64/Flashbang
